text:
1.2. Multilayer Perceptrons for Time Series 4
 Focus on linear relationships: assuming a linear relationship excludes more complex
joint distributions.
 Focus on ﬁxed temporal dependence : the relationship between observations at
diﬀerent times, and in turn the number of lag observations provided as input, must be
diagnosed and speciﬁed.
 Focus on univariate data: many real-world problems have multiple input variables.
